title: New Nether Hub
added: Central Nether hub with 8 portals for easier travel.
changed: Hub decorated with quartz pillars & glowstone lighting.

title: Quality of Life Improvements
added: Expanded villager trading hall to include armorers.
changed: Increased mob cap for better farm output.
Map wall updated to show new player builds.
fixed: Resolved Nether roof suffocation on login.

title: Server Launch!
changes: Spawn area completed with community board and basic farms.
Rules & info book placed in player starter chests.
